title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: He succeeded Marc Overmars, who left in early 2022. Mislintat appointed Maurice Steijn as head coach. Mislintat spent approximately 111 million euros on transfers. Ajax had its worst start to the season in fifty-nine years. On 29 October 2023, Ajax reached a historic low.

title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: On 23 May 2024, Farioli was appointed head coach of Dutch club Ajax, signing a three-year contract and becoming the club's first Italian manager. His appointment also marked the first time Ajax had hired a foreign manager since Morten Olsen in the 1997–98 season.
